com.g2mobility.xbee.recycler

Class XBeeDeviceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.g2mobility.xbee.recycler.XBeeDeviceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener

    public class XBeeDeviceAdapter
extends 
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    RecyclerView adapter for the XBeeNodesFragment.

    This adapter uses view holder to hold inflated recycler view items and binds them to RemoteG2BeeDevice.
